Package ml

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgInsertionMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for scoring INSERT_BETWEEN transitions when the label of the relevant edge is a PropBank argument slot, i.e. it matches :ARG[0-9].
    AutoLoadParams
    This class contains parameters required for automatically loading a maximum entropy model.
    ChildInsertionMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for scoring INSERT_CHILD transitions.
    DenomMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for articles.
    FeatureManager
    A helper class to manage a list of features and to turn them into a list of strings required for maximum entropy modeling.
    FirstStageMaxentModel  
    LossEvaluator
    Helper class to evaluate precision, recall and F1 score of binary classifiers.
    NumberMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for articles.
    OpenNlpMaxentModelImplementation
    An implementation of a maximum entropy model based on the GISModel class from OpenNLP.
    OtherInsertionMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for scoring INSERT_BETWEEN transitions when the label of the relevant edge is not a PropBank argument slot, i.e. it does not match :ARG[0-9].
    ParentChildReorderMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for scoring <* as required to score REORDER transitions (see Eq. 19, Section 4.2.1 Modeling).
    PosMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for parts of speech (POS).
    Prediction
    This class represents a partial transition function along with an assigned score.
    RealizeMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for scoring REALIZE transitions.
    SiblingReorderMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for scoring <l and <r as required to score REORDER transitions (see Eq. 19, Section 4.2.1 Modeling).
    StanfordMaxentModelImplementation
    An implementation of a maximum entropy model based on the LinearClassifier class from Stanford NLP.
    TenseMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for tenses.
    VoiceMaxentModel
    This class implements a maximum entropy model for voices.
